00028 void cli::EnsureCommonDevices(void)
00029 {
00030     OutputDevice::GetNullDevice();
00031     OutputDevice::GetStdOut();
00032     OutputDevice::GetStdErr();
00033     IODevice::GetStdIn();
00034 }

00037 {
00038     GetTraces();
